mapper.insert:
insert into ceap.tb_student(s_name, s_num, s_sex, s_birthday, s_photo, cl_id, create_time, modify_time, deleted) values
(#{entity.sName}, #{entity.sNum}, #{entity.sSex}, #{entity.sBirthday}, #{entity.sPhoto}, #{entity.clId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifyTime}, #{entity.deleted})

insert into ceap.tb_student(s_name, s_num, s_sex, s_birthday, s_photo, cl_id, create_time, modify_time, deleted) values
(#{entity.sName}, #{entity.sNum}, #{entity.sSex}, #{entity.sBirthday}, #{entity.sPhoto}, #{entity.clId}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.modifyTime}, #{entity.deleted})
on duplicate key update s_name = values(s_name) , s_num = values(s_num) , s_sex = values(s_sex) , s_birthday = values(s_birthday) , s_photo = values(s_photo) , cl_id = values(cl_id) , create_time = values(create_time) , modify_time = values(modify_time) , deleted = values(deleted)
